column1: [Highlight] SGA with the behind the back assist to Theo Maledon!
Theo Maledon tonight in the loss to the Nets : 8/9 from the field and 6/6 from three for 24 points
OKC rookie Theo Maledon tonight: 24 points, 3 rebounds, 3 assists (1 TO), 1 steal, on 8-9 shooting (6-6 from three).
Thunder rookie Theo Maledon tonight: career high 24 points on 8-9 FG and 6/6 from 3
Theo Maledon with the cross-court pass to Mike Muscala for the and-one 3
OKC rookie Theo Maledon since being made a starter (13-game stretch): 10.2 points/gm, 3.4 rebounds/gm, 3.8 assists/gm (1.8 TOs), 1.5 steals/gm, 44.0% FG, 45.2 3P% (4.8 3PAs/gm), 94.1% FT.
Theo Maledon now holds the most assists by a rookie this season with 12
